title: El Tambor
subtitle: The Drum
meta_desc: Learn about the drum in Spanish with audio pronunciation. Ages 2-5.
keywords: learn Spanish preschool, el tambor Spanish, drum Spanish kids

pages.title: El Tambor
pages.prompt: Warm, child-friendly watercolor illustration, landscape 16:9 format, soft pastel colors, a bright colorful drum with drumsticks on top, fun and inviting.

pages.title: El tambor hace ruido.
pages.prompt: Warm, child-friendly watercolor illustration, landscape 16:9 format, soft pastel colors, a drum being hit with sound waves and musical notes radiating out.

pages.title: Yo golpeo el tambor.
pages.prompt: Warm, child-friendly watercolor illustration, landscape 16:9 format, soft pastel colors, a child happily hitting a colorful drum with drumsticks.

pages.title: Pum, pum, pum.
pages.prompt: Warm, child-friendly watercolor illustration, landscape 16:9 format, soft pastel colors, big colorful letters PUM PUM PUM bouncing off a drum.

pages.title: El tambor tiene ritmo.
pages.prompt: Warm, child-friendly watercolor illustration, landscape 16:9 format, soft pastel colors, children marching in a parade with drums, happy and rhythmic.

pages.title: El tambor es redondo.
pages.prompt: Warm, child-friendly watercolor illustration, landscape 16:9 format, soft pastel colors, a round drum seen from above showing its circular shape.
